//comment//: Project ID should be unique. Index order <=0 : hidden, index order <10 : show as featured card.
title: Example Project No. 1

summary.text: Variables and maps determine the number of columns, the gutter width, and the media query point at which to begin floating columns. We use these to generate the predefined grid classes documented above, as well as for the custom mixins listed below.
